title: Biden Will Campaign for Gov. Hochul in New York on Sunday
description: The campaign visit by the president underscores how tight the governorâ€™s race is between Ms. Hochul and Representative Lee Zeldin, a Republican.
dc:creator: Nicholas Fandos
media:credit: Kenny Holston for The New York Times
media:description: President Biden, who appeared with Gov. Kathy Hochul at an event in Syracuse, N.Y., last month, has agreed to campaign with her on Sunday.
